mozilla.components.concept.tabstray

Interface TabsTray


  • public TabsTray

    Generic interface for components that provide "tabs tray" functionality.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  TabsTray.DefaultImpls
      Generic interface for components that provide "tabs tray" functionality.

    • Method Detail

      • displaySessions

        void displaySessions(java.util.List<mozilla.components.browser.session.Session> sessions,
                     int selectedIndex)

        Displays the given list of sessions.

        This method will be invoked with the initial list of sessions that should be displayed.

        Parameters:
        sessions - The list of sessions to be displayed.
        selectedIndex - The list index of the currently selected session.

      • updateSessions

        void updateSessions(java.util.List<mozilla.components.browser.session.Session> sessions,
                    int selectedIndex)

        Updates the list of sessions.

        Calling this method is usually followed by calling onSession*() methods to indicate what exactly has changed. This allows the tabs tray implementation to animate between the old and new state.

        Parameters:
        sessions - The list of sessions to be displayed.
        selectedIndex - The list index of the currently selected session.

      • onSessionsInserted

        void onSessionsInserted(int position,
                        int count)

        Called after updateSessions() when count number of sessions are inserted at the given position.

      • onSessionsRemoved

        void onSessionsRemoved(int position,
                       int count)

        Called after updateSessions() when count number of sessions are removed from the given position.

      • onSessionMoved

        void onSessionMoved(int fromPosition,
                    int toPosition)

        Called after updateSessions() when a session changes it position.

      • onSessionsChanged

        void onSessionsChanged(int position,
                       int count)

        Called after updateSessions() when count number of sessions are updated at the given position.

      • asView

        android.view.View asView()

        Convenience method to cast the implementation of this interface to an Android View object.
